specificHeat.note: Approximate value for caramelized sugar melt

decomposition.note: Sucrose begins decomposing (caramelizing) at melting point; breaks down into complex mixture of compounds

viscosity.note: Extremely viscous; thick, sticky liquid (caramel consistency)

caramelization.note: As temperature increases, sucrose breaks down into hundreds of flavor compounds; color darkens, flavor becomes complex and bitter
